text: They've been taking in some of the most iconic sights in the UK, and have documented their trips to the London Eye and Piccadilly Circus via Instagram. But Chris Hemsworth and wife Elsa Pataky kept things low - key as they stepped out on a coffee date at a branch of Gail's bakery in the capital on Friday morning. The Australian action hunk, 35, and the Spanish actress, 42, looked happy and relaxed as they chatted away while enjoying an al fresco caffeine fix and tucked into a shared pastry.
